ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well what Fear for? Just curious as to what makes you think they are gonna make Hate any better than fear. Espescially when it was tuned to FoH Standards? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Well what Fear for? Just curious as to what makes you think they are gonna
make Hate any better than fear. Espescially when it was tuned to FoH
Standards?



-----Original Message-----
From: Abraham Hardjana [mailto:ahardjan@...]
Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 2:24 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?


From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>



On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Snicker Furfoot, Esq. wrote:

> From the "official" source:
> "During last night's event, the Plane of Hate 'opened up a gate and let
> forth it's minions'. It is not open as yet, however. This is just a
> preview of things to come."

I am almost sure that the plane is open for two reasons. A GM mentioned
that the plane is open and the fact that Fennin Ro server has already
travelled to the zone. Hopefully I am right, as it is due time that they
gave the level 50s somethign to do so they can level us level 20-30 alone
in our dungeons =)

Treilanin Loreweaver

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
